channel.title: PI call familiar
channel.description: I need a better method for calling your familiar. I had one working but it only works when your close to my summoned npc. Once i go farther than where the npc is at it doesnt let my summon it. I changed the part for it but it does work but it summons more than 1 npc. I need help making it better for when you call your npc.

item.title: PI call familiar
item.dc:creator: @blddyboy blddyboy
item.description:
@blddyboy wrote:

I need a better method for calling your familiar.
I had one working but it only works when your close to my summoned npc.
Once i go farther than where the npc is at it doesnt let my summon it.
I changed the part for it but it does work but it summons more than 1 npc.
I need help making it better for when you call your npc.

Read full topic
